original_text: On the eighth day, the person must bring his gifts to the Lord. He must bring them to the door of the Tent of Meeting.
korean_text: 여덟째 날에 그 결례를 위하여 그것들을 회막 문 여호와 앞 제사장에게로 가져갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: the person must bring his gifts to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 자기의 예물을 주께 가져가야 하며

sentences.original_text: He must bring them to the door of the Tent of Meeting
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들을 회막 문 앞에 가져가야 한다
